data.text: Definitely not 4 star. Hit and miss with reception staff some helpful some rude and miserable. Cleaner was scarily aggressive when I tried to collect something from the room  she was in there for over 20 minutes the bedding wasn‚Äôt changed in 6 days there and the floor wasn‚Äôt swept. Opposite the hotel is a tent city near to the seafront. No room service, tea and coffee not replaced , very basic. Would rate this hotel 3 star
data.title: Not 4 star

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We are sorry that your experience was not what you expected. 

We work hard to provide the best service to our clients.
The maids asked you to protect your belongings, so that no one enters your room when they are there. 

About the cleaning, our hotel cleans the entire room every day, and changes the sheets and towels, so we  don't understand what could happened. 

Anyway, we will take note to improve our service in order to provide you with a better experience next time you visit us.

Kind Regards,
Best Front Maritim
owner_response.author: Pilar Rios

data.text: Stayed 4 nights, day 2  had to  request rooms be cleaned, then sit in the lobby until 17:30. Day 1 water and instant coffee in rooms, then denied replenishment when requested. Showers have no doors! The restaurant was ok but not at a 5 star rating. We moved to a much nicer hotel in the area with same price and better service.
data.title: 3 star hotel with 4 star fees. Would not stay again.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest
Thank you for your cooperation, we are sorry that we have not met your expectations. The maids have a schedule and must do the rooms on the same schedule, as in this case, since there will always be one customer left to do the last one. The tea and coffee are replenished, and if it hasn't been done yet and you request it, they are always delivered and they also have these products at reception so you can pick them up right there.
We apologize for any problems we may have caused.
Best vRegards
Hotel Best Frontmaritim
owner_response.author: Werner Francis

data.text:
October 2023
Check was good the gentleman was fantastic 
Board was breakfast only and was okay is apart from stale bread (everyday)
Room was the corner room was great views all
Around short distance to the beach which was perfect the city is only a short trip
And a nice walk along the boardwalk
data.title: Clean & friendly

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you very much for your visit and for your time in sharing this fantastic review about your experience.
Rest assured that everything you have told here will be of great help to future visitors, and we hope to have your visit again very soon.

Sincerely
Hotel Best Frontmaritim
owner_response.author: Werner Francis

data.text:
When we read all the negative comments we were dreading going and not looking forward to it! But we had the best time ever! Can‚Äôt fault the hotel or staff, they went above and beyond to help with anything needed! üò¨
David behind the bar was an absolute diamond! Helped us with all the info on the transport that we needed! Rooms were comfortable and clean! And the pizza üçï was 10/10! Very happy with our time in the hotel and would 10000% come back! Thanks to each and everyone of you!
data.title: Brilliant time!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your visit and for sharing this nice review about your experience at our hotel. We are glad that everything was to your liking, as it encourages us to continue working with enthusiasm and dedication in order to achieve the best comfort and attention to our guests.
We hope to have your visit many more times in the future.
Sincerely,
Hotel Best Frontmaritim
owner_response.author: Werner Francis

data.text: Room was comfortable and a pleasant temperature for sleep. The bathroom was a joy in black marble complete with loads of hot water. The restaurant was only for breakfast but there are many restaurants in the locale. Breakfast was good, combining cooked and continental, as much as you need. The hotel is in the business area but is well supplied with bars and a really large shopping centre with a lovely food court. The beach is just across the main road outside the hotel and is clean and well tended with a surf school for the more adventurous. The hotel is approximately a one hour walk from the sagrada familia along the main roads but a taxi is only 10-15 minutes and quite reasonably priced. Uber cabs are available as well.
data.title: My first visit to Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  Guest,

Thank you for your visit and for sharing this nice review about your experience at our hotel. We are glad that everything was to your liking, as it encourages us to continue working with enthusiasm and dedication in order to achieve the best comfort and attention to our guests.
We hope to have your visit many more times in the future.
Sincerely,
Hotel Best Frontmaritim
